DataElement.preferredName: Lymphedema and Breast Cancer Questionnaire During Past Six Months Have Tenderness Experience Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of whether or not during the past six months they have or had tenderness in their arm, breast, or chest, using a yes or no indicator.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lymphedema and Breast Cancer Questionnaire During Past Six Months Have Tenderness Experience
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer._At some point in a given period of time._Past; before the present time._A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A question about whether an individual has or had tenderness._The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer.

Concepts.definition: A condensed version of a self-administered or structured interview questionnaire designed specifically for evaluating lymphedema symptoms after surgery for breast cancer.

Property.preferredName: During Past Six Month Have Tenderness Experience
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:Past; before the present time.:A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:A question about whether an individual has or had tenderness.:The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
A question about whether an individual has or had tenderness.
The accumulation of knowledge or skill that results from direct participation in events or activities.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
